techmeme.title: Chainalysis: ~2M wallets have bought the $TRUMP memecoin, of which ~764,000 wallets have lost money and 58 have made over $10M each, totaling ~$1.1B in profits (MacKenzie Sigalos/CNBC)
Uber and Chinese company Pony.ai partner to deploy Pony.ai's robotaxis on Uber's platform, starting with a launch in "a key market in the Middle East" in 2025 (Rebecca Bellan/TechCrunch)
Analysis: TM SGNL, TeleMessage's modified version of Signal used by senior Trump officials, could send plaintext chat logs to TeleMessage's archive server (Micah Lee/micahflee)
Patreon rolls out an updated version of its iOS app that lets users make purchases via the web in addition to using in-app purchases (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
A US jury awards Meta nearly $168M in damages from NSO Group in connection with the 2019 spyware attack on more than 1,400 WhatsApp users' phones (Matt Simons/Courthouse News Service)
